name: L Shooter (TweetTweetJam 7)
description:
Yet another space shooter. A game in 557 characters of code for TweetTweetJam 7.

PICO-8 Source Code:

_set_fps(60)m=61h=0::s::s=0p={}o={}y=m x=m t=0n=0g=.1z=0::_::cls(1)t+=.002z-=.1f=100*t ?s ?h if(t>n)g*=.99add(p,{x=m,y=f+32,v=rnd(3),o=rnd()})n+=g b=btn()x+=(b&2)/2-(b&1)y+=(b&8)/8-(b&4)/4x=mid(x,121)y=mid(y,123) if(z<0and btn(4))z=2add(o,{x=x,y=y-4}) for q in all(p)do u=q.x+58*cos(t+q.o)v=f-q.y+32*sin(t*q.v)d=nil ?"✽",u,v,9 if(abs(x-u)<5and abs(y-v)<3)h=max(h,s)goto s for r in all(o)do if(abs(r.x-u)<5and abs(r.y-v)<3)d=1s+=1del(o,r) end if(v>160or d)del(p,q) end for r in all(o)do r.y-=3 ?"::",r.x,r.y,14 if(r.y<-4)del(o,r) end ?"★",x,y,12 flip()goto _
